meanings.definition: The act of sending back or referring to another person or authority.
meanings.sent1: The renvois of the package to the sender was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent2: She included a renvois to the original document in her report.
meanings.sent3: The renvois of the lost puppy to its owner was a heartwarming moment.
meanings.sent4: His renvois to the past brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The renvois of the ball hitting the wall made a loud sound.

meanings.definition: A reference or citation to another source or authority.
meanings.sent1: The renvois in the article led me to an interesting book.
meanings.sent2: The renvois to the scientific study was crucial for my research.
meanings.sent3: Her renvois to the recipe book helped her bake a delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: The renvois to Shakespeare's works enriched the essay.
meanings.sent5: The renvois to the map guided us through the forest.
